alerts.description: CRM Notification Project Placed On Hold
Notify Operations Team of Closure Nomination
Notify Opportunity Owner of Project Manager Assignment
PSA Project Email Alert Notification II
PSA Project Email Alert Notify PS Manager when Stage = Open In Progress
PSA Project Email Alert Notify Region Owner and PS Manager

fieldUpdates.name: Mark as Closed for Time Entry

fieldUpdates.description: Sets PS Manager (SE Manager) email based on region and product line.
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( pse__Region__r.Name = "APAC", pse__Region__r.pse__Region_Head__r.Email, IF( pse__Region__r.Name = "EMEA", "alejandro.arteaga@intapp.com", pse__Practice__r.SE_Manager__r.Email ) )
fieldUpdates.name: PSA Project PS Manager Email

fieldUpdates.description: Set CFEE when Project is not Active.
fieldUpdates.name: PSA Project Set CFEE

fieldUpdates.description: Set CFTE when Project is not Active.
fieldUpdates.name: PSA Project Set CFTE

fieldUpdates.description: Unset CFEE when Project is Active
fieldUpdates.name: PSA Project Unset CFEE

fieldUpdates.description: Unset CFTE when Project is Active.
fieldUpdates.name: PSA Project Unset CFTE
PSA Project Update Region Owner Email
PSE Project Set Close for Expense Entry
PSE Project Set Close for Time Entry
Populate End Date to 6 months away

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Date Project Creation Approved field
fieldUpdates.name: Update Approval Date

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Project Creation Approved By field
fieldUpdates.name: Update Project Creation Approved By

fieldUpdates.description: Update Status to be Open - In Process
fieldUpdates.name: Update Project Status

outboundMessages.description: Creates a Clarizen Project when the FF Projects meet the correct criteria.
outboundMessages.name: clz_0a4a7ad5d4724379848ab0f10ca75a74

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-003xFxx PSA PS Project Set PS Manager Email Set the PS Manager (SE Manager) email on projects when created.

criteriaItems.value: Closed - Never Should Have Been Created

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-005xFxx PSA Project Inactivate Project 7 Days After Close Date Unset Active flag 7 days after the status is set to Closed. This will also trigger the project to be CFTE and CFEE.
Rule Code: PR-006xFxx PSA Project Is Not Active Closes the project for time and expense when the active check box is uncheck (false)
Rule Code: PR-007EFxx PSA Project Notify Region Owner & PS Manager on Creation Sends an email notification to Region Owner and PS Manager when a project is created.
Rule Code: PR-008xFxx PSA Project Set Region Owner Email Set Region Owner Email whenever Region is changed
Rule Code: PR-009xFxx Populate Project End Date This rule populates the project end date to 9/9/2099 if the date is blank.
Rule Code: PR-010Exxx Notify Opp Owner of PM Assignment Sends an email notification to sales rep when a Project Manager is assigned, to notify the sales rep of that assignment.
Rule Code: PR-011xFxx PSA PS Project Set ES Manager Email For Intapp Open Projects, set Mark Burgard as the ES Manager
Rule Code: PR-012xFxx Set Partner Prime Projects Non-Billable Set Billable to False and Time Credited to True when Billing Type is "Partner Prime"
Rule Code: PR-013xFxx Populate CRD Email Populates the CRD Email field with the email of the related CRD when a project is created
Rule Code: PR-014xFxx Populate CSM Email Populates the CSM Email field when it is blank
Rule Code: PR-015EFxx Project Closing Notification Sends an email alert whenever a project is closed. Also updates the Project Stage field to "Completed"
Rule Code: PR-016xFxx Update Project Status based on Stage Update the Status based on the Project Stage value 'Open - Not Started' and Project Phase '1: Solution Design'
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, 'Open - Not Started') && ISPICKVAL(pse__Project_Phase__c, '1: Solution Design')

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-017xFxx Update Current Time Period Updates the Update Current Time Period field when it is blank
Rule Code: PR-018xxOx UpdateProjectInDTE Sends an outbound message in DTE that updates Project
rules.formula: ISNEW() || ISCHANGED(Name) || ISCHANGED(pse__Allow_Timecards_Without_Assignment__c) || ISCHANGED(pse__Closed_for_Time_Entry__c) || ISCHANGED(pse__End_Date__c)|| ISCHANGED(pse__Is_Active__c) || ISCHANGED(pse__Account__c)

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-020Exxx Project Nominated for Closure Sends an email alert to Operations Team when a project is nominated for closure.
Rule Code: PR-021Exxx Sold Hours Updated Sends an email to the Project Manager whenever the Sold Hours are updated
Rule Code: PR-023xFxx Populate Project Manger Email Address Populates the project manager email address field whenever a project is created
Rule Code: PR-026Exxx Project Placed on Hold Sends an email alert to the CSM team that a project has been placed on hold.
Rule Code: PR-030xFxx Create Clarizen Project Checks Create Clarizen Project checkbox when Project manager and Clarizen Template fields are populated
Rule Code: PR-031xFxx Populate Expense Policy Information Populates the Expense policy field if Expense Policy is not blank
Rule Code: PR-032xFxx Populate Per Diem Fields Populate Per Diem Fields when Expense Policy is "Flat Rate Billed Expense" and Per Diem fields are blank
rules.formula:
AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Expense_Policy__c), ISNEW() ), ISPICKVAL(Expense_Policy__c, "Flat Rate Billed Expense"), ISBLANK(Per_Diem_Domestic__c), ISBLANK(Per_Diem_International__c)
)

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-033xFxx Populate Project Phase Populates Project Phase as 0 when the project manager is assigned.
Rule Code: PR-034Exxx Project Creation Rejection Notification Sends an email whenever a project creation has been rejected by PS Finance
Rule Code: PR-037xFxx Close Project for Time Entry Check Closed for Time Entry checkbox whenever Project Type is set to "Executive Project"
Rule Code: PR-038xFxx Update Clarizen Project Type (Internal) Update Clarizen Project Type (Internal) with "Internal Project" when Project Type is "Internal Project"
Rule Code: PR-039xFxx Update Clarizen Project Type (Executive) Update Clarizen Project Type (Executive) field with "Executive Project" whenever Project Type value is "Executive Project"
Rule Code: PR-040xxOx clz_9f15ef8a-6d5e-4c1d-91d1-25736b91776d Sends an outbound message to clarizen to create a project whenever Create Clarizen Project checkbox is checked
Rule Code: PR-041xFxx Populate Project Creation Notification Sent Checkbox Populates Project Creation Notification Sent checkbox after Creation Approval Status has been set to Ops Approved
Rule Code: PR-042xFxx Update Most Recent Approval Date Updates the Most Recent Approval date on the project whenever Creation Approval Status is changed and set to "Ops Approved"
Rule Code: PR-043Exxx Notify Carolina of Project Creation Sends an email notification to Carolina whenever Create Clarizen Project checkbox is checked.

Rule Code: PR-044xFxx Update Date Project Approved Field Populates Date Project Creation Approved field whenever Creation Approval Status is set to "Ops Approved" and Date Project Creation Approved field is blank
Rule Code: PR-045xFxx PSA Project Active is False Workflow Rule triggers when Active changes from False to True.
Rule Code: PR-046xFxx PSA Project Active is True Workflow Rule triggers when Active changes from False to True.
rules.formula: AND( pse__Is_Active__c = true, NOT ISBLANK( pse__Project_Manager__c ))

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-047Exxx PSA Project Notify PS Manager when Stage = Open - In Progress PSA Project Notify PS Manager when Stage = Open - In Progress
Rule Code: PR-048xFxx Check Write Off Flag If a project is marked as Closed - Canceled, the write off flag will be checked.
Rule Code: PR-049xFxx Update Project Recurring Amount
Rule Code: PR-050Exxx Notify CR Team of Project needing approval
Rule Code: PR-051Exxx Project Closing Notification I. Sends an email notification whenever a project is closed. Also updates the Project Stage field to "Completed"
rules.formula:
AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(pse__Stage__c),"Closed"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "Closed - Never Should Have Been Created")), NOT(pse__Group__r.Id = 'a1q500000074TRL'), ISPICKVAL(pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(pse__Opportunity__r.Type, "After Market Partner Opportunity"))
)

rules.description: Rule Code: PR-052Exxx PSA Project Notification Notify the Region Owner and PS Manager when a project is created.
